sentences.en: Every room in that house was elaborately decorated.
sentences.cn: 那房子的每间屋都精心装潢过.

sentences.en: Hairs, like feathers, are long and elaborately specialized scales.
sentences.cn: 毛发象羽毛一样是长长的和精致的专门化了的鳞甲.

sentences.en: He apologized slowly and elaborately for the accident.
sentences.cn: 他便慢吞吞地,勉勉强强地为发生这次事故向他们道了歉.

sentences.en: He elaborately devised a new computer.
sentences.cn: 他精心设计了一台新电脑。

sentences.en: Her hair, as a rule so elaborately arranged , was tumbling untidily over her neck.
sentences.cn: 她的头发通常梳得十分讲究, 现在却乱蓬蓬地披在后面.

sentences.en: It was clearly an elaborately planned operation.
sentences.cn: 那显然是一次精心策划的行动。

sentences.en: Now appeared Joe Harper, as airily clad and elaborately armed as Tom.
sentences.cn: 这时,乔-哈帕出现了.和汤姆一样,他精心装备,轻装上阵.

sentences.en: Now appeared Joe Harper, as clad and elaborately armed as Tom.
sentences.cn: 这时,乔-哈帕出现了.和汤姆一样,他精心装备,轻装上阵.

sentences.en: Shakespeare's plays are often elaborately annotated to make them easier to understand.
sentences.cn: 莎士比亚剧本往往注释详尽,便于理解.

sentences.en: Tell me elaborately, sometimes the stories may give us a relax.
sentences.cn: 仔细讲给我听听，有时候这些故事可以放松心情。

sentences.en: The corporate bodies collaborate elaborately on producing vibrating evaporator.
sentences.cn: 法人团体在生产振动蒸发器之后精心制作协作.

sentences.en: The critics roasted the elaborately staged work.
sentences.cn: 剧评家将那用心演出的作品评得一文不值.

sentences.en: The Hamar are among the most elaborately attired of Ethiopia's ethnic groups.
sentences.cn: 哈马族是埃塞俄比亚所有种族中最善于用鹿角制作首饰.
这个房间摆设得很考究.

sentences.en: The wedding - cake was elaborately iced.
sentences.cn: 结婚蛋糕上挂着一层精致的糖衣.

sentences.en: There is a good variety in our products and are elaborately designed.
sentences.cn: 我们公司的产品种类多样,但都经过精心设计.

words.tran_cn: 精心制作的；详尽的；煞费苦心的
苦心经营，精巧；详细阐述
精心制作；详细阐述；从简单成分合成（复杂有机物）

trans.tran_cn: 苦心经营地，精巧地，精心
trans.tran_en: in a detailed and carefully arranged manner.
